query:
UPDATE user_streaks SET
                        current_streak = current_streak + 1,
                        longest_streak = GREATEST(longest_streak, current_streak + 1),
                        last_checkin_date = $1,
                        total_checkins = total_checkins + 1,
                        updated_at = NOW()
                    WHERE user_address = $2
                    RETURNING current_streak as "streak!"
